This is a 2019 Nissan Qashqai 1.2T Visia, the vehicle is ready for long road trips and the hustle and bustle of the city life. This vehicle is great on off-road and on road. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
